tool.name: Merge GFF3 Files
tool.description: Merges given GFF3 files into one.

param.name: omit_fasta
param.label: Do not print fasta sequence in footer

param.name: legacy
param.label: Merge legacy annotation sets (ignores already having seen features more than once for the same contig)

tool.help: This tool merges GFF3 files together. By default, the FASTA will be included at the end of the file and evidence from MAKER will be included if found.
